item.title: Independent Coursework
item.description: Prof. Weber-Wulff compiled a hand-out about ICs, as Pr√ºfungsausschussvorsitzende. (Mirror on my site) I find it highly informative. Please read it! In addition to that, my specific rules about ICs are as follows: You need to talk to me - preferably during the office hours (see below) - about your topic and register in LSF for the correct semester and course (IC1 or IC2). You will be rejected first and accepted later manually, please re-register as long as possible/necessary (Neuanmeldung).
